COMMON.TEXT: Welcome to Animania Studio, a creative powerhouse situated in the charming city of Gyumri, Armenia. Established in 2022, our studio stands as a beacon of excellence in the world of 3D animation. With a team comprising 30 skilled professionals, including modellers, animators, riggers, lighting and shading artists, we specialize in the art of crafting mesmerizing cartoons and captivating commercials. At Animania Studio, we believe in the magic of storytelling through animation. We blend technical expertise with boundless creativity to transform your ideas into visually stunning realities. Whether you seek whimsical characters or stunning visuals for your marketing campaigns, our studio is your trusted partner. We go beyond animation; we provide comprehensive 3D animation solutions for our esteemed partners. Your success is our success, and together, we'll make your vision come to life with exceptional artistry and innovation. Join us at Animania Studio, where imagination meets expertise, and let's create something extraordinary together.
